fi.cebylfwk.lwjgl
Class GameLWJGL

java.lang.Object
  fi.cebylfwk.lwjgl.GameLWJGL
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public abstract class GameLWJGL
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game

This is LWJGL implementation of Game interface. This is abstract base class which can be used as basis for the games.

initialize

public void initialize(int resX,
                       int resY,
                       int bpp,
                       boolean fullscreen,
                       java.lang.String gameTitle,
                       int frameRate,
                       boolean vSync)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: Game
Initializes game to given resolution. This should be first method to be called.

Specified by:
initialize in interface Game
Parameters:
resX - x resolution.
resY - y resolution.
bpp - bits per pixel (16,24,32)
fullscreen - Fullscreen enabled.
gameTitle - Game title which is shown on window border.
frameRate - Framerate what this game is capped to.
vSync - Vertical sync enabled, if true.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

Description copied from interface: Game
This will start main game loop.

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Description copied from interface: Game
This should be called when game is finished. Here should be cleaned all the game resources.s

Specified by:
cleanup in interface Game

addState

public void addState(State st)
Description copied from interface: Game
Adds state to the game. States are run on added order. When one state finishes the next one will be run.

Specified by:
addState in interface Game
Parameters:
st - State to be added.
